00028 #ifndef __GLSLESCgProgram_H__
00029 #define __GLSLESCgProgram_H__
00030 
00031 #include "OgreGLSLESProgram.h"
00032 #include "OgreStringVector.h"
00033 
00034 namespace Ogre {
00039     class _OgreGLES2Export GLSLESCgProgram : public GLSLESProgram
00040     {
00041     public:
00043         class CmdProfiles : public ParamCommand
00044         {
00045         public:
00046             String doGet(const void* target) const;
00047             void doSet(void* target, const String& val);
00048         };
00050         class CmdEntryPoint : public ParamCommand
00051         {
00052         public:
00053             String doGet(const void* target) const;
00054             void doSet(void* target, const String& val);
00055         };
00056 
00057         GLSLESCgProgram(ResourceManager* creator, 
00058             const String& name, ResourceHandle handle,
00059             const String& group, bool isManual, ManualResourceLoader* loader);
00060         ~GLSLESCgProgram();
00061 
00062 
00064         void loadFromSource(void);
00065 
00067         const String& getLanguage(void) const;
00068 
00070         void setEntryPoint(const String& entryPoint) { mEntryPoint = entryPoint; }
00072         const String& getEntryPoint(void) const { return mEntryPoint; }
00074         void setProfiles(const StringVector& profiles);
00076         const StringVector& getProfiles(void) const { return mProfiles; }
00077     protected:
00078         static CmdEntryPoint msCmdEntryPoint;
00079         static CmdProfiles msCmdProfiles;
00080         String mEntryPoint;
00081         StringVector mProfiles;
00082 
00083         // check if syntax is supported
00084         bool isSyntaxSupported();
00086         String resolveCgIncludes(const String& inSource, Resource* resourceBeingLoaded, const String& fileName);
00087         // deletes the key word ": register(xx)" that hlsl2glsl doesn't know to handle
00088         String deleteRegisterFromCg(const String& inSource);
00089     };
00090 }
00091
